name: Cárcel de mujeres
overview: Stories about women in prison. Their addictions, unresolved problems with the justice system and inner struggles.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Camila Padro, a well-renowed journalist  is accused of murdering her husband is given eight years in prison. Upon arriving there, she is confronted with the violence and aggressiveness of the inmates.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Nadia Meyer was raised in a prostitution house in Valparaíso and is the daughter of an American sailor who she never met. She was raped by her stepfather when she was a teen, when she grew up she kills him and imprisoned for that. Years later she becomes the leader in the women's prison.
